question: Which river divides the city of Toruń, Poland into two parts?
asked_question_translated: Welke rivier verdeelt de stad Toruń in Polen in twee delen?
answer: De Wisła-rivier verdeelt de stad Toruń in Polen in twee delen.
answer_translated_eng: The Wisła River divides the city of Toruń in Poland into two parts.
